title: Fragment, late 17th–early 18th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: resist printed on plain weave
creditline: Museum purchase from Au Panier Fleuri Fund
description: Fragment printed on both sides in black over a greenish-blue ground. Design on one side shows open flower faces with pointed leaves, stems and foliage curving around flower heads to form active open frame. On reverse side a small block design framing small flower head alternating with one selvage present.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, late 17th–early 18th century.
late 17th–early 18th century. Medium: linen
